sourcesContent:
• {{category}}
import {Component, OnInit, Output} from '@angular/core'; import {products} from "./products"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ _category?:string = "AllProducts"; title = 'my-store'; categories = ['All Categories','Electronics', 'Clothing', 'Home&Garden', 'Grocery','Beauty&Health'] setCategory(category: string): void{ this._category = category; console.log(this._category) } getCategory(): string { return this._category; } ngOnInit(): void { console.log(this._category) } }
